strings.Value: "Tristian, why you so boring, huh? I've seen you fight! Sword covered in blood, corpses underneath your feet â€“ but your face is so sad, it's like your favorite uncle's funeral."
"Sarenrae teaches us to show mercy to all, even one's enemies. By interrupting their life's journey, I've deprived them of a chance to better themselves and atone for their sins."
